data: Below is a list of all the available Item Components within Minecraft:Bedrock Edition for use with Item JSON files.
Item Components requires the Holiday Creator Features experimental toggle to be set to `true` in order to function properly.

>Holiday Creator Features contains experimental gameplay features. As with all experiments, you may see additions, removals, and changes in functionality in Minecraft versions without significant advanced warning.
>To learn more about Experimental Features, please visit [Experimental Features in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition](../../../../../Documents/ExperimentalFeaturesToggle.md)

data.Name: [minecraft:armor](ItemComponents/minecraft_armor.md)
data.Description: The armor item component determines the amount of protection you have in your armor item.

data.Name: [minecraft:block_placer](ItemComponents/minecraft_block_placer.md)
data.Description: Planter item component. Planter items are items that can be planted.

data.Name: [minecraft:cooldown](ItemComponents/minecraft_cooldown.md)
data.Description: Cool down time for a component. After you use an item it becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.

data.Name: [minecraft:digger](ItemComponents/minecraft_digger.md)
data.Description: Digger item. Component put on items that dig.

data.Name: [minecraft:display_name](ItemComponents/minecraft_display_name.md)
data.Description: Display Name item component. Display Names display the name of an item.

data.Name: [minecraft:durability](ItemComponents/minecraft_durability.md)
data.Description: Durability item component: how much damage can this item take before breaking.

data.Name: [minecraft:dye_powder](ItemComponents/minecraft_dye_powder.md)
data.Description: Dye powder, there are 16 kinds of dye.

data.Name: [minecraft:entity_placer](ItemComponents/minecraft_entity_placer.md)
data.Description: Entity placer item component. You can specify allowed blocks that the item is restricted to.

data.Name: [minecraft:food](ItemComponents/minecraft_food.md)
data.Description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player.

data.Name: [minecraft:fuel](ItemComponents/minecraft_fuel.md)
data.Description: Fuel component. Allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.

data.Name: [minecraft:icon](ItemComponents/minecraft_icon.md)
data.Description: The icon item component determines the icon to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

data.Name: [minecraft:knockback_resistance](ItemComponents/minecraft_knockback_resistance.md)
data.Description: Knockback Resistance Item. Component put on items that provide knockback resistance.

data.Name: [minecraft:on_use](ItemComponents/minecraft_on_use.md)
data.Description: The on_use item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used.

data.Name: [minecraft:on_use_on](ItemComponents/minecraft_on_use_on.md)
data.Description: The on_use_on item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used on a block in the world

data.Name: [minecraft:projectile](ItemComponents/minecraft_projectile.md)
data.Description: Projectile item component. Projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.

data.Name: [minecraft:render_offsets](ItemComponents/minecraft_render_offsets.md)
data.Description: Render offsets component: optional values can be given to offset the way the item is rendered.

data.Name: [minecraft:repairable](ItemComponents/minecraft_repairable.md)
data.Description: Repairable item component: how much damage can this item repair, what items can repair it.

data.Name: [minecraft:shooter](ItemComponents/minecraft_shooter.md)
data.Description: Shooter Item Component.

data.Name: [minecraft:throwable](ItemComponents/minecraft_throwable.md)
data.Description: Throwable item component. Throwable items, such as a snowball.

data.Name: [minecraft:weapon](ItemComponents/minecraft_weapon.md)
data.Description: Weapon Item Component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.

data.Name: [minecraft:wearable](ItemComponents/minecraft_wearable.md)
data.Description: Wearable item component
